allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Ashley Robinson LLC website

Complete static website with Home, About, and Contact pages featuring
luxury design system with Playfair Display + Montserrat typography,
gold accent color palette, scroll animations, and responsive layout.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove LLC from branding, enlarge footer logo, remove location info

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add real images to consulting, suit design, and wedding sections

- Business & Vision Consulting photo in consulting section
- Custom Suit Design photo in suit design section  
- Wedding Suit photo as cinematic background for wedding section

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename image files to URL-safe names \(fix broken images\)

Spaces and & in filenames caused broken image paths on deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
